Description: Rim sherd mended from two fragments) of Chian, possibly early patterned, pottery chalice; white slip; interior: reserved band at top of rim, glazed streaky black (fired brown) below; pairs of added white bands at centre and bottom of sherd; exterior reserved, with black line at top of lip; inscription on exterior.
Bibliographic references: Petrie 1886 / Naukratis. Part I., 1884-85 (pl. XXXII, no 18)
Bernand 1970 / Le Delta égyptien d'après les textes grecs, i: les confins libyques (p. 644, no. 20)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.0285) (phase 2)
